articles.author: Matt Egan, CNN Business
articles.title: First on CNN: Citi is the first mega bank to kill overdraft fees - CNN
articles.description: Citigroup is saying goodbye to overdraft fees, making it the biggest US bank to pledge to eliminate the controversial charges.
